feature_descriptions.loc: Lines of code in the file/module.
feature_descriptions.num_functions: Number of functions defined in the file.
feature_descriptions.avg_function_length: Average lines of code per function.
feature_descriptions.cyclomatic_complexity: Overall cyclomatic complexity of the file.
feature_descriptions.max_nesting_depth: Maximum depth of nested control structures.
feature_descriptions.max_function_complexity: Highest cyclomatic complexity of any single function.
feature_descriptions.lint_warning_count: Number of lint/style warnings reported for this file.
feature_descriptions.comment_to_code_ratio: Ratio of comment lines to code lines.
feature_descriptions.review_comment_count: Number of code review comments left on this file.
feature_descriptions.test_coverage_percent: Percentage of this file's code covered by automated tests.
feature_descriptions.num_test_files_linked: Number of test files linked to or covering this module.
feature_descriptions.code_churn_recent: Recent lines added/removed (measure of code churn).
feature_descriptions.num_contributors: Number of different contributors modifying this file.
feature_descriptions.file_age_days: Age of the file in days since creation.
feature_descriptions.fan_in: Number of other modules depending on this file.
feature_descriptions.bug_count_total: Total number of historical bugs linked to this file.
feature_descriptions.bug_density: Bug density (bugs per 1k lines of code).
feature_descriptions.bugs_last_30_days: Number of bugs reported in the last 30 days.
feature_descriptions.bug_trend: Recent bug trend (-1 decreasing, 0 stable, 1 increasing).
feature_descriptions.test_fail_count_related: Number of test failures recently related to this file.
feature_descriptions.days_since_last_change: Days since the file was last modified.
